tool.name: genomes
tool.command:
parsec genomes install_genome
#if $func: --func "$func" #end if #if $source: --source "$source" #end if #if $dbkey: --dbkey "$dbkey" #end if #if $ncbi_name: --ncbi_name "$ncbi_name" #end if #if $ensembl_dbkey: --ensembl_dbkey "$ensembl_dbkey" #end if #if $url_dbkey: --url_dbkey "$url_dbkey" #end if #for $rep in $repeat_indexers: --indexers "$rep.indexers" #end for
| jq -S . > $results

param.name: func
param.label: func
param.help: Allowed values: 'download', Download and index; 'index', Index only

param.name: source
param.label: source
param.help: Data source for this build. Can be: UCSC, Ensembl, NCBI, URL

param.name: dbkey
param.label: dbkey
param.help: DB key of the build to download, ignored unless 'UCSC' is specified as the source

param.name: ncbi_name
param.label: ncbi_name
param.help: NCBI's genome identifier, ignored unless NCBI is specified as the source

param.name: ensembl_dbkey
param.label: ensembl_dbkey
param.help: Ensembl's genome identifier, ignored unless Ensembl is specified as the source

param.name: url_dbkey
param.label: url_dbkey
param.help: DB key to use for this build, ignored unless URL is specified as the source

param.name: indexers
param.label: indexers
param.help: POST array of indexers to run after downloading (indexers[] = first, indexers[] = second, ...)
